com.nestlabs.sdk

Interface NestListener.AuthListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NestListener
    Enclosing interface:
    NestListener

    public static interface NestListener.AuthListener
extends NestListener
    Listens for updates to the status of authentication of NestAPI to the Nest service.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.nestlabs.sdk.NestListener

        NestListener.AuthListener, NestListener.CameraListener, NestListener.DeviceListener, NestListener.GlobalListener, NestListener.MetadataListener, NestListener.SmokeCOAlarmListener, NestListener.StructureListener, NestListener.ThermostatListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAuthFailure(NestException exception)
      Called when the authentication with the token fails.
      void onAuthRevoked()
      Called when a previously authenticated connection becomes unauthenticated.
      void onAuthSuccess()
      Called when the authentication with the token succeeds.

    • Method Detail

      • onAuthSuccess

        void onAuthSuccess()
        Called when the authentication with the token succeeds. The NestAPI instance is now ready to make read/write calls to the Nest API.

      • onAuthFailure

        void onAuthFailure(NestException exception)
        Called when the authentication with the token fails. An exception is returned that can either be thrown or read to determine the cause of the error.
        Parameters:
        exception - a NestException object containing the error that occurred.

      • onAuthRevoked

        void onAuthRevoked()
        Called when a previously authenticated connection becomes unauthenticated. This usually occurs if the access token is revoked or has expired.
